skills.skill: Financial knowledge (AP, AR, GL, financial reporting)
Commercial Off the Shelf product familiarity (Allegro, RightAngle, Waterfield, OneStream, UltiPro)
ITIL concepts and incident management processes
Troubleshooting and issue resolution across multiple systems

duties_responsibilities.duty: Monitor and maintain Oracle financial applications to maximize availability and performance.
Troubleshoot and resolve business issues related to financial systems.
Create new reports and resolve errors or concerns with existing reports.
Investigate and diagnose service requests or incidents for assigned applications.
Provide technical and functional assistance for assigned applications.
Collaborate with users to identify and resolve issues impacting business processes.
Utilize 3rd parties and vendor support as defined within existing support arrangements.
Complete high-level designs and estimates to meet defined requirements.
Provide input to IT Project Management Office to support clear and concise requirements definitions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field (Master's preferred)
